project_descr: BRA/16/G76-Stage II of HCFC Phase out Mngt Plan (HPMP - Stage II) aims to continue the work being undertaken under Stage I, in the Brazilian PU foam sector, with aims to implement actions addressed to phase out 303.0 ODP t of HCFC consumption by 2021.

outputs.output_descr: The Implementation and Monitoring Unit is aimed at supporting and assisting the GoB in implementing actions and activities under Stage II of the HPMP, in particular related to the PU foam sector.
Projects aimed to convert A5-based companies that operate in the rigid polyurethane foam sub-sector in the rigid PU foam sector in Brazil to non-HCFC technologies.

Implementation and Monitoring Unit, Regulatory Actions and RAC System Components, Equipment, Tools and Consumables for the Implementation of HCFC Containment Demonstration Projects in Brazilian Supermarkets.

Formulation of regulatory actions to support and guarantee that the activities to be completed during Stage II of HPMP produce the expected results, pursuant to the associate agreement signed between the GoB and the Montreal Protocol.

project_title: bra/16/g76 - hcfc phase out management plan (stage ii)
